properties.address: 188 Beechcroft Road, Wiltshire, Wiltshire SN2 7QQ
properties.description: Public Library with wifi, public pc's and work stations, books and borrowing facilities, board games, story telling activities, public accessible toilets, baby changing facilities, refreshments, room hire available, free parking, information and advice,
properties.title: Beechcroft Library

properties.address: Central Community Centre, Wiltshire SN1 5BG
properties.description: The Central Community Centre is an important Swindon heritage landmark, and previously the Great Western Medical Fund Hospital. Today, it is a thriving community centre in the heart of Swindon's historic Railway Village and looked after by the Mechanic's Institution Trust.
properties.title: Central Community Centre

properties.address: Gateway Church, Swindon, Wiltshire SN5 7AR
properties.description: We meet every Thursday morning, 11am-1pm, and are community space where everyone is welcome! For those who enjoy doing things, we have board games, puzzles and craft available, or you can just pop in for a chat. We also offer support with English as a second language, a space for children to play, free Wifi, hot drinks and light refreshments. It’s a place to just come and be and to enjoy the company of others. We believe that everyone has got something to bring and something to offer. If you’re free on a Thursday morning, please do come along. It’d be great to meet you! **Please note that we are closed over school holidays and half terms.**
properties.title: Gateway Warm Welcome

properties.address: Rope Yard, Royal Wootton Bassett, Wiltshire
properties.description: Open from Tues 10 - 12.30pm. We are open every Tues 10 - 12.30pm. A warm welcoming space for all. We offer hot drinks & biscuits and at 11.45am start serving jacket potatoes with fillings & salad, plus a desert.
properties.title: Royal Wootton Bassett Methodist Church

properties.address: Swindon Hub, Wiltshire SN1 3LD
properties.description: A community space run by the community in the Swindon Town Centre offering free activities and events to the public with an affordable cafe on site.
properties.title: Swindon Hub

properties.address: Silver Street, Calne, Wiltshire SN11 0JA
properties.description: A friendly space, open from 10.00am until 4.00pm. Free meals, coffee, tea, Games, papers and magazines, Craft (Knit and Natter), Movement to music fitness sessions. Wifi capability. Easy access. Friendly staff and voliunteers
properties.title: Warm Space Calne Methodist Church

properties.address: Bakers Cafe, Wiltshire SN1 5BN
properties.description: We're Open - Swindon We're Open is our volunteer led community cafe held at the Baker's Cafe in the centre of Swindon, every Thursday between 6.30pm - 8.30pm. We're Open brings the community together by providing a relaxing, welcoming and inclusive environment with free hot drinks and sweet treats. Play board games, listen to culturally diverse music often performed by cafe guests, develop your english language skills and enjoy a safe, warm and welcoming environment.
properties.title: We're Open

properties.address: Toothill Church, Wiltshire SN5 8SX
properties.description: Our space is open to all. Here you will find companionship, friends to make and a friendly smile. There are things to do such as games, crafts, etc. Tea and coffee, bread and soup are provided free. We look forward to seeing you.
properties.title: Welcome Space
